urls.title: Sophie set for momentous climate change voyage
urls.description: An Environment Agency employee from Brighton is embarking on a once in a lifetime sailing voyage to highlight the issues of plastic pollution and climate change.

text:
Sophie from @EnvAgency plastics & sustainability team is joining the sailing crew of the #Darwin200 environmental research project, studying concentrations of plastic waste in UK waters. Read more here https://t.co/Veknch7wxG
#PreventingPlasticPollution @Plastic_EU @CitytoSea_
